item.title: Trump says he doesn't want Somalis in the U.S., urges them to go back to their homeland and fix it
item.description: President Trump says he doesn't want Somali immigrants in the U.S., saying residents of the war-ravaged eastern African country are too reliant on U.S. social safety net and add little to the U.S.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump says he doesn't want Somali immigrants in the U.S., saying residents of the war-ravaged eastern African country are too reliant on U.S. social safety net and add little to the U.S.

item.title: White House justifies strikes on boat survivors, but it's unclear where buck stops
item.description: In the face of charges that these strikes amount to execution without trial, the White House is sending a confusing message about who exactly gave each order to use deadly force.

item.title: Michael and Susan Dell commit $6.25 billion for investment accounts for kids
item.description: Michael and Susan Dell are donating $6.25 billion to fund "Trump Accounts" for 25 million U.S. children. The gift would put $250 into each eligible child's account.

item.title: Pope Leo wraps up his visit to Lebanon with prayers at the site of Beirut's port blast
item.description: Pope Leo XIV ended his first overseas papal trip with prayers at Beirut's devastated port and a Mass attended by 150,000 worshippers in a country desperate for signs of hope amid fear of renewed war.
